proficiencies.weapon: Club; Dagger; Dart; Javelin; Mace; Quarterstaff; Scimitar; Sickle; Sling; Spear

characteristics.ideals: Change is good, which is why I live by an ever-changing set of rules. (Chaotic)
characteristics.personality-trait-2: Good music makes me weep like a baby.
characteristics.bonds: A trusted friend is the most important thing in the multiverse to me.
characteristics.personality_trait_1:
Spring - You do everything with enthusiasm, even the most mundane chores.

Summer - You stand tall and strong so that others can lean on you.

Autumn - If someone is in need, you never withhold aid.

Winter - A penny spent is a penny lost forever.
characteristics.character_backstory:
I was born in the Spring Court to take care of the animals. There, I gained an understanding or the animal behaviours, strengths, and weaknesses.

Soon after, I joined the Druid Circle of the Moon. Where I was taught how to transform into different animals.

In my free time I practice the pan flute and one day I want to be a renowned bard; like Doja Cat.

Just before I was transported to the Mortal Plane, I was munching on some fruits and nuts while lounging in the shade of a weeping willow with my pets; scimmia and topo.

Right after I found myself in on the Mortal Plane, I found a campfire in the forest where some dead bandits lay. Upon searching the camp, I found a spear and a dagger. Luckily, I kept my yew wand on me.
characteristics.flaws:
Spring - Toil is for drudges. Yours should be a life of leisure.

Summer - Punch first. Talk later.

Autumn - You spend excessively on creature comforts.

Winter - Everything dies eventually. Why bother building anything that is supposedly meant to last?

traits.features-and-traits-2:
Darkvision: 60 ft.
Immunities: magical-sleep

---------------Actions--------------
Wild Shape. You can transform into a beast you have seen with CR 1/2 and no flying speed (lasts 3 hours, use twice/rest).

-----------Other Traits------------
Druidic. You can speak Druidic and use it to leave hidden message and automatically spot messages left by others.

Fey Ancestry. Advantage on charmed saves and immune to sleep magic.

Trance. Trance 4 hrs. instead of sleep 8.
